content:
© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
BI infrastructure and reporting
1
Built the data warehouse by consolidating different data sources and also the data 
cubes which is used by the top management to quickly access the data and 
analyse. Partnered with the chief strategy officer and other department heads to 
design and build the executive level dashboards on POWER BI for each 
department, which are updated automatically on a daily basis.
(Michelin star restaurant chain)

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Accordion Value Add 
•
Consolidated different data sources (ERP – Ascentis, POS systems - Acewill, Seito), and built an integrated data warehouse. 
•
Defined KPIs and built data cubes to track Sales, P&L, Inventory, Production and Supply Chain performance, and also enable efficient data management.
•
Designed, developed and deployed 30 distinct dashboards on Power BI to track performance by department and provide transparency on business 
performance to the Management team. 
Situation
•
Lack of clear reporting infrastructure to track KPIs across data sources, geographies and functional areas such as, Strategy, Marketing, Finance and 
Operations. 
•
Partnered with the client to design and build an integrated data warehouse, data cubes and executive level dashboards that are updated automatically on 
a daily basis.
BI infrastructure design and implementation
2
Impact
•
The reporting infrastructure and dashboards supported critical decision making for the Management
•
On average, 90% reduction in time taken to manage the data and gain visibility into the business performance
•
Six weeks turnaround time for BI Transformation
BI INFRASTRUCTURE AND REPORTING
